summary.para: This action simulates a page turn from the bottom right hand corner of the screen. It's not much use by itself but is used by the PageTurnTransition.

remarks.para: Based on an original paper by L Hong et al. http://www.parc.com/publication/1638/turning-pages-of-3d-electronic-books.html
When this action is added to a CCNode, the action will run over a period of time.
